backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister handling user profiles, suppliers, products, categories, orders, carts, access control, Stripe configuration, and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI update to the seller dashboard overflow menu with linked files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, pages, styling, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes, colors, and layout base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the root React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router layout handling authentication, redirects, route-specific layouts, and global modals/toasters.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen prompting unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity.
Admin-only button that seeds demo products using the addProduct mutation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with dynamic year, caffeine.ai attribution link, and placeholder policy/contact links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling auth, navigation, cart count syncing, and conditional links for users and suppliers.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Landing page footer with links and a dynamic attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Simple landing header with logo and a button that scrolls to and focuses the email input section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, email, and supplier option, including onboarding email prefill.
frontend/src/components/seller/ProductFo: Dialog for adding or editing products, managing form fields, images, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerDas: Seller dashboard side drawer providing navigation, placeholders for future features, and product navigation handling.
Renders onboarding cards for sellers with actions to configure store details and add products. Uses navigation and supplier profile data to guide setup steps.
Provides a dropdown menu with store settings, view store, and logout actions. Clears identity and cache on logout and redirects accordingly.
Displays the seller dashboard top bar with a menu button, search input, notifications, overflow menu, and user avatar. Generates initials from the store name.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerPro: Shows a table of products with editing, stock updates, and delete actions. Handles loading state and empty product lists with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and stored identity restoration. Wraps AuthClient with custom behavior and exposes identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, supplier data, Stripe config, checkout sessions, and product actions. Uses the actor for all authenticated calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, global styles, and custom utility classes like soft shadows and landing section backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Manages cart state from localStorage, allowing quantity updates and item removal, and renders a detailed cart UI with subtotal and actions.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Loads cart data, computes totals, and creates a Stripe checkout session via a hook before redirecting the user.
frontend/src/pages/CreateStorePage.tsx: Displays a form to create or update a supplier store, pre-filling fields if editing and submitting via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring hero content, email signup tied to Internet Identity login, and various marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a failure message for canceled payments with navigation buttons back to cart or retry checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a successful payment confirmation with options to return home or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Renders a product catalog with search, sorting, supplier/category filters, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Displays the seller dashboard with profile loading states, product list, onboarding prompts, and navigation drawer.
frontend/src/pages/StoreViewPage.tsx: Shows a single store’s profile and products with a hero banner, loading/error states, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/pages/SuppliersPage.tsx: Lists all suppliers with product counts and navigation to their store or filtered product listings.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Defines static asset URLs used across the app such as logos, banners, and placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides sessionStorage helpers for persisting onboarding email and redirect targets.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Returns product and cart item image URLs with fallback to a placeholder.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/query parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, extended theme values, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements for a Shopify-like e‑commerce platform.
